title: Given Measurements
text: The diagram gives the measurements of the hypotenuse and one of the legs.

title: Pythagorean Theorem Definition
text: The Pythagorean Theorem is given as $$a^2+b^2=c^2$$, where a and $$b$$ refer to the legs of a right triangle adjacent to the $$90$$ degree angle, and c refers to the hypotenuse.
